pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to popular questions
faq.a1: Simply register on our website and choose a suitable pricing plan. We'll help you set up everything you need.
faq.q2: Can I change my plan later?
faq.a2: Yes, you can change your pricing plan at any time. Changes will take effect in the next billing cycle.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards, bank transfers, and cryptocurrencies.
faq.a4: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial period for all new users.
faq.a5: You can contact our support team via email, chat, or phone. We're available 24/7.
faq.a6: Yes, you can export all your data at any time in various formats.

hero.title: Ready-to-use Next.js starter
hero.subtitle: Mantine UI, next-intl, ESLint/Prettier, Storybook, Docker, and CI/CD are preconfigured. Follow the README checklist and ship without setup overhead.

core.title: Next.js 16 and React 19
core.description: Turbopack in dev, standalone build for prod, TypeScript 5.6, robots.txt and sitemap pages are ready.

ui.title: UI and localization
ui.description: Mantine 8 with AppShell, color scheme toggle, and next-intl locales (ru/en).

state.title: State and API
state.description: Zustand store plus a typed Axios API configuration.

sentry.title: Observability
sentry.description: Sentry configs for client, server, and edge + ClientAnalytics for page views.

storybook.title: Storybook and tests
storybook.description: Storybook 10, component examples, and ready-to-use Jest/Testing Library setup.

lint.title: Code style defaults
lint.description: ESLint 9 + Prettier (css-order), Husky and lint-staged before each commit.

tests.title: Testing
tests.description: Jest + Testing Library, coverage, playwright/vitest for Storybook.

cli.title: Automation
cli.description: CLI `yarn cli` to scaffold components from a template.

scripts.title: Project scripts
scripts.subtitle: Common flows from the README
scripts.dev: Runs the dev server on Turbopack with webpack fallback.
scripts.build: Builds the app and starts a standalone production server.
scripts.lint: ESLint checks and autofix via lint:fix.
scripts.test: Jest: standard, watch, and coverage modes.

github.title: GitHub Actions
github.description: Lint, format, typecheck, tests, build, Docker image to GHCR, and SSH deploy.

docker.title: Docker
docker.description: Ready Dockerfile: NODE_ENV=production, BASE_URL, BUILD_ID, and version envs.

env.title: Environment
env.description: NEXT_PUBLIC_SITE_URL, SENTRY_DSN, BUILD_VERSION, APP_ENV, and more for SEO and monitoring.

health.title: Health-check
health.description: GET /api/health returns status, timestamp, uptime, APP_ENV, and BUILD_VERSION.

seo.title: SEO ready
seo.description: Generated robots.txt and sitemap.xml with optional dynamic SITEMAP_ENDPOINT.

errors.title: Error handling
errors.description: Error Boundary for localized routes, retry button, and Sentry reporting.
